# Invitation to Qualify: Marine Facility Water System Upgrade (Phase 1)

## Solicitation Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites qualified contractors to participate in the first phase (Phase 1) of a two-phase process for the upgrade of the Domestic Water and Fire System at the Institute of Ocean Sciences Sidney location in British Columbia.

## Scope of Work
The scope of work encompasses the upgrade of the Marine Facility Water System, including the replacement of existing equipment and infrastructure, to ensure compliance with current regulations and standards.

## Key Dates
The tender closing date for Phase 1 is December 27, 2023, at 14:00:00. Following Phase 2 solicitation closing, bid results will be recorded and may be obtained by e-mailing a request to the address indicated in the Invitation to Tender.

## Anticipated Contract Duration
The expected contract start date is not provided; however, the expected contract end date is February 28, 2025.

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation of Phase 1 will be based on the qualifications of the bidders. Only qualified contractors will be invited to participate in Phase 2, where they will submit a financial bid on the project.

## Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact:
Michaela Costa
Department of Public Works and Government Services
michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents and Specifications
A comprehensive document outlining the tender requirements, specifications, and evaluation criteria is available on the Ariba platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18221201](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18221201).
